function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Beyond visible line of sight bvlos drone operations remain somewhat unsafe, requiring technological and operational guidelines for safe operations.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Robots in hospitals could malfunction and spread infection instead of containing it.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on robot technology may lead to reduced human oversight and care.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected individuals during sample collection and patient support","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of workplace contact tracing wearables may create a sense of surveillance and distrust among employees.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improper disposal of the biosensor patches may lead to potential disease spread.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited adoption of contact tracing apps","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid and widespread adoption of the app without adequate understanding of its limitations and capabilities","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to use technology for covid-19 prevention","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of collective action to combat covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance with lockdown measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Circulation of fake news related to lockdown measures, healthcare guidelines, and public safety","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases , covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hoarding of essential items","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance of residents to adopt hems due to associated costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey focused on new york metropolitan area, limiting generalizability to other regions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in adoption intention for hems energy and wellbeing features during pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption intention of hems wellbeing features during covid-19 influenced by attitudes, cost concerns, cybersecurity concerns, and demographics such as income, age, and household size.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk perception was found to be positively related to adoption intention of hems with both energy and wellbeing features.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Factors influencing willingness to pay wtp for hems wellbeing features during covid-19, including attitudes, perceived usefulness, and demographic factors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residents’ willingness to adopt and pay for hems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social-psychological factors influencing hems technology adoption intention and wtp during covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social norms as a strong predictor of adoption intention and willingness to pay for energy-related and well-being features","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Small sample size in new york may not be representative of the entire new york city area or other cities in the u.s.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for cultural differences in social distancing, energy burden, access to technology, and healthy built-home environments may lead to biased findings.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to address social- psychological factors such as perceived fairness and social networks could result in overlooking important risk factors for disease propagation.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to adaptive measures due to privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Divergence in opinions of different groups of experts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Convergence without consensus","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of the expert-led approach for selection and identification","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey participants with less than 3 years of experience may lack the necessary expertise to provide accurate and reliable opinions and suggestions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent opinions and suggestions due to varying levels of experience among the participants.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of bias towards the opinions and suggestions of participants with longer experience, leading to the neglect of valuable input from less experienced participants.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People gathering in groups to participate in questionnaire","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulated weighting analysis process involving 25 participants from each field","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Institution of separate tracks for junior and senior residents","category":"Institutional risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of teleconference software may lead to increased screen time and sedentary behavior.","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of well-studied learning methods","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Creation of cultures and societies of transition","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Speculative view rather than discussing possibilities in relation to current practice","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Calls for new ethically-based, collaborative and deliberative principles and practices","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selective use of existing research sources","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on climate crisis mitigation efforts","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift from anthropocentric worldview to ecological worldview","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ignoring early warnings of climate crisis and pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting messages from authorities on responsible behaviors during crises","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of climate crisis and covid-19 on vulnerable populations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"}]}
